name: KITCH
title: Software Engineer
desc: The KITCH meals application allows customers to buy KITCH meals online for in-store pickup. The application also allows for two forms of membership signup and management: Token memberships and delivery memberships. With token memberships, user sign up for a recurring plan that charges them for a set number of tokens each week. Each token can then be exchanged through the application or in-store for a meal. With delivery memberships, users select their desired meals and sign up for a weekly delivery plan. Members can view all their past orders and their current token count, as well as pause, change, or cancel any plans they have signed up for.
